id.description: An identifier for this address within an agreed scheme of address identifiers.

postbox.description: A post office box number registered for postal delivery by a postal service provider.

floor.description: An identifiable floor of a building.

room.description: An identifiable room, suite, or apartment of a building.

streetName.description: The name of the street, road, avenue, way, etc. to which the number of the building is attached.

additionalStreetName.description: An additional street name used to further clarify the address.

blockName.description: The name of the block (an area surrounded by streets and usually containing several buildings) in which this address is located.

buildingNumber.description: The number of a building within the street.

inhouseMail.description: The specific identifable location within a building where mail is delivered.

markAttention.description: The name, expressed as text, of a person or department in an organization to whose attention incoming mail is directed; corresponds to the printed forms `for the attention of`, `FAO`, and `ATTN:`.

markCare.description: The name, expressed as text, of a person or organization at this address into whose care incoming mail is entrusted; corresponds to the printed forms `care of` and `c/o`.

plotIdentification.description: An identifier (e.g., a parcel number) for the piece of land associated with this address.

citySubdivisionName.description: The name of the subdivision of a city, town, or village in which this address is located, such as the name of its district or borough.

cityName.description: The name of a city, town, or village.

postalZone.description: The postal identifier for this address according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

countrySubentity.description: The political or administrative division of a country in which this address is located, such as the name of its county, province, or state, expressed as text.

countrySubentityCode.description: The political or administrative division of a country in which this address is located, such as a county, province, or state, expressed as a code (typically nationally agreed).

region.description: The recognized geographic or economic region or group of countries in which this address is located.

district.description: The district or geographical division of a country or region in which this address is located.

timezoneOffset.description: The time zone in which this address is located (as an offset from Universal Coordinated Time (UTC)) at the time of exchange.

country.description: The country in which this address is situated.

locationCoordinate.description: The geographical coordinates of this address.
